subject: Plus X P2-H2 - Cost in the uk
description_text:
Hello,

I am lookign at the  Plus X P2-H, but am really confused at the cost. I
thought yourwebsite was a normal one with a delivered cost but it talks
about taxes/customs. Do you know how much this will cost from the UK
please? If it adds too much on it might be out of my budget?

Thank you

James

conversations.body_text: Hi James,    Our products are shipped to the UK without any additional taxes or fees for customers, so please do not worry.

Great thank you.

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-pedal-pro-x-with-heel-plate?variant=50434623537466
If I order the above and chose the haptic set, does this include everything
needed? Like mounts, power, etc?

Thank you

James

On Tue, 12 Aug 2025 at 11:03, support@simsonn.com
Hi James,     If you select the option that includes the VAM Pro, it will come with the motor bracket and a standalone power supply.

So I think i've narrowed my choice down to the Plus X.
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals?variant=51288365171002

I have to admit the naming is confusing to follow, so hopefully on the
right track using what I can work out from the website and the helpful
poster on reddit.

What is the difference in the control box between the Plus X and the Pro X
ultra? They are different shapes?

Do both the control boxes give full functionality for Hapitc reactors - AM
Pro Linear Motor?

Thank you

On Wed, 13 Aug 2025 at 01:12, support@simsonn.com

Hi James,  The Pro X Ultra control box has more control units than the Plus X control box, and its electronic components are more sophisticated, but its advantages can only be realized when using the Pro X Ultra. For the Plus X, the main control box included with the purchase of the pedal is perfect!
